meanings.definition: A settled way of thinking or feeling about someone or something, typically one that is reflected in a person's behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her attitudes towards exercise changed after she started seeing results.
meanings.sent2: His positive attitudes towards teamwork made him a valuable member of the group.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attitudes towards the new toy were hilarious to watch.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's strict attitudes towards discipline kept the class in line.
meanings.sent5: The company's attitudes towards customer service set them apart from their competitors.

meanings.definition: A position of the body proper to or implying an action or mental state.
meanings.sent1: She stood with a confident attitude, ready to face any challenge.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's graceful attitude captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The dog's playful attitude while fetching the ball brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The tree's leaning attitude gave it a unique character in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's determined attitude before the race was evident to all spectators.
